label: 万機
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: The term appears in the Han histories and was current in Yamato court parlance in the early 700s. It is used, for example, in the Nihon shoki 日本書紀 to describe Senior Prince Shōtoku's authority in Suiko's era.　[聖徳、推古]
